title: Request
description: A request sent from controller to router, or from router to sniffer client.

action.description: Action that is supposed to be performed by receiver.

apStatus.description: Whether to collect AP status, e.g., current channel, tx power, etc.

apScan.description: Whether to collect AP scan results.

stationDump.description: Whether to collect associated station information.

clientScan.description: Whether to collect client scan results.

clientTraffic.description: Whether to collect client traffic (by turning client into monitor mode).

clientLatency.description: Whether to collect client latency (to sniffer AP).

clientThroughput.description: Whether to collect client throughput (to sniffer AP).

trafficChannel.description: If collect client traffic, which channel to listen.

channelDwellTime.description: How long (in seconds) should the client snif one channel.

client.description: The client that this request should be redirected to.

newBSSID.description: New AP BSSID that the client should associate to.

channel.description: Channel to use in this band.

txPower.description: Tx power (in dBm) to use in this band.
